entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h through mainland inlets and valleys. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 28 April 2023
